page.title: 10BASILDON NE: AFTER SCHOOL
page.content: I am ten years old. When I get home from school I have a drink and then I get on my bike and go round my friend's house. We usually go up the park and play on the swings. When we are really going high we jump off. Sometimes we play a game of chasing when we have to stay off the ground by moving across the climbing frames and swings and things. After, I go home and play games on the computer or write programs for it. Sometimes I play with my sisters. On Mondays I usually go out to Girl Guides. On Saturdays and Sundays I go and visit my father. We used to do lots of things together but now he has a new girl-friend we don't do so much. Mainly we just go up to his club and I sit around while they have a drink. Other than that I don't do much.
